Title: Designates a portion of the state highway system as the "Thruway Maintenance Supervisor Stephen C. Ebling Memorial Bridge"
Summary: Designates a portion of the state highway system in the town of Eden, county of Erie, as the "Thruway Maintenance Supervisor Stephen C. Ebling Memorial Bridge".
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law, in relation to designating a portion of the state highway system as the "Thruway Maintenance Supervisor Stephen C. Ebling Memorial Bridge"
